It came very wrinkled so definitely would need a steam.
it was very pretty, but it wasn’t flattering as they described it in the description. material was kind of thin the length was good.
Good weight for hot southern summers. Pretty colors.
Comfortable, beautiful, receive compliments when worn. Have several in other patterns
Love BoHo

Bought this and really disappointed with the quality of the product. For that price, I expect they would use good quality fabrics. The product looks cheap and I regret buying it. I wish I listened to one of the reviews here that told the buyers about the quality of the fabric. I ended up giving it away to Goodwill.

I love the way it looked and felt but for a price of over 40$, I can't justify the material. It probably won't last long. For that price, I can go to a brand name outlet for a better quality and even pay less. It did look amazing but, too high price for the quality

Looks cute in the photo, but it's poor quality. I hand-washed it and hung it to dry. It's quite shapeless and not flattering at all. I ended up selling it for nothing at a consignment shop. Don't waste your $$.
It's a little frumpy looking. Happy I didn't pay full price.
Looks great and fits great

This would have been cute if it fit. It was a bit small in the bust and hips. The material felt like a decent quality and I think it would have been flattering if it fit well. I got the XL, so there wasn't a larger size to order as a replacement. I would have probably tried the next size up if it was available.
Returned months ago

I bought the white floral in large after already owning the sleeveless navy in XL. It runs true to size and their chart. I ordered up the first time thinking it would shrink but it didn’t. I have gotten more compliments in this dress the three times I’ve worn it than any other piece of clothing I’ve owned. It’s very comfortable, light, not see through, able to be thrown in the wash (I hang dry), and modest. I’m 5’8” and wear large shirts and a size 12 in pants if that helps anyone with sizing.

This is a pretty light-weight dress with a lovely pattern. Unfortunately it did not fit me well. I am 5'3" and this dress is too long waisted for me, and too long in general. I will be returning this. This dress will look better on someone taller.
I returned this dress and the manufacturer claimed they never received the return. Charged me full price for this garbage! Buyer beware!!

I was a little skeptical in ordering clothes online- I’m the type of person that tries on before buying but I am so glad I took the chance with this dress!!  It is so light and airy but not see through and very comfortable to wear. The only thing is the sleeves are not as long as the picture shows but can easily be overlooked.  I am very happy with the dress it seems well made and I will definitely be purchasing more. Shipping was fast.
It’s soft flowing comfortable and very flattering.  I love the length and I can’t wait to wear this beautiful dress.  The color was as pictured.  Very happy with the dress and will buy more.
soft material

The quality of materials was very poor. The dress looked and felt cheap, like there was $5 of materials used in its construction. The cut around the neck was misaligned, the material was very thin. The print was washed out and the color faded and the hem had a multitude of loose threads.
Cheap material and didn't seem to fit true to size. Got a rip in it pretty quickly after it arrived.

评论概述: These dresses are my FAVE!! I have 4!
评论详情: I loveeeee these dresses! I have it in 4 different styles. Fits true to size. The material is super light so I can wear it in this Texas summer heat or I can wear it in the winter with a jacket over it. It’s super comfortable and flattering especially if you’re a thicker woman like me. I wore these while I was pregnant with both my babies as well. Buy it!
It’s so comfy and lightweight! Super soft fabric. I seam ripped out the waistband elastic and use a safety pin to pin back the waist. I love it!

I was looking for a colorful, beachy dress and this fits the bill perfectly. It’s thin enough to be light and airy without being see through (the darker print at least). The elastic in the waistband is really tight. I’m 5’4 and 130 lbs. I have a small high waist or else I’d have to return the small for a medium. I’d order a size up if this is a concern for you. Otherwise, it’s a perfect dress. I’ve already got lots of compliments.
I’m happy with this dress!  I’m 5’4 1/2 and about 155lbs - the large fit me perfectly and is very comfortable.  The hem sits just above my ankle.  Nice colors.

I get so many compliments when I wear this. I actually just bought it in a different color. My only note is that it is a little tighter in the hips than the photos show. So for anyone with curvy hips like mine, it might be form fitting from the waist to mid-thigh. I don’t mind though! It’s a good length, and I’m 5ft. The top is very flattering and the material is light. I recently wore it in one of the hottest days in San Fran and it was comfortable the whole day.

I wore This dress to church with my daughter as in the picture, I had so many people asked me where I got it. It fit very comfortable had plenty of room for a size medium. The fabric is very nice, and the color mix is beautiful.
I usually order up a size when I see made in China but reviews said true to size and they were correct. Nice fabric. Nice fit. I am really happy that I got these on prime day for $30. Worth it. I
Nice dress, but could be better. Looks like I got it off Amazon.

I’m 5’-1.5” tall, with very long legs and basically NO TORSO. This dress is a rare find for me - it does not fall off my shoulders and the V-neck does NOT hang down to my navel! Don’t know how it will work out for the rest of the population, but I’M HAPPY!
The feel of this fabric is so soft and comfortable.
Nice material!  Decent price too!

I wanted this dress to fit.  It is really cute, long, and seems to be made well.  It doesn’t fit me in the bust area well and tends to pull in that area.  I will be sending it back, unfortunately.  I wish there was a size a tad larger, but there is not.
Fit is great. Nice material. Highly recommend

That’s not my favorite color but not awful. I will still wear it. It did wash and dry without any issues. Good purchase.
Perfect fit. Fabric is soft and not see-through. Easy, comfortable dress.

Love this dress, color is brighter than I expected but I’m happy with it. Very light and breathable fabric, soft and comfy to wear shopping or just around the house. I’m 5,4 and about 220, the XL is a perfect fit. Sits right at my ankles so it doesn’t drag all the time. Only part I’m bummed about is not having any pockets. I’m 152 pounds and it fits very nice. I love the quality it’s soft, I love color the style and especially really fits me The way I want. I’m very comfortable to go to church or to go out with my new dress.

I really liked this garment's style, cut, and printed design. It was also very thoughtfully packaged. Sizing was accurate. I almost kept it because it is so cute. This dress is beautiful! I received so many compliments while wearing it. I bought a large and should have got a medium. It was loose and flowy. The sleeves are as pictured. I have no complaints other than I should have sized down. Breathable fabric and comfortable. No pockets, it is full length and longer than I expected. I'm 5'5 and paired it with wedges. Super cute, work professional or to church or dinner.
this dress for a large is smaller than expected and compared to another one I purchased.

评论概述: Warning! Do not put in dryer!
评论详情: I loved this dress, but only wore it twice. After it was washed it shrunk and no longer fits. I washed in cool water and took out of dryer before completely dry. It shrunk considerably. I wear a size 12, purchased a Large and it was big before I washed it. Now it is very tight across the chest area. Very disappointed.

I weigh 156-lbs, 5' 2' tall, Bust is 38DD, waist 36" Hips 43". I ordered the LARGE and it fits perfect everywhere. If your bustline is larger than mine I suggest you size up. But the large gives me just enough slack in the bustline to not look tight. I ordered the Navy Floral and I say the color representation is accurate.  This is not a stretchy fabric so make sure you pay attention to sizing. Also I plan to wash this on the handwash cycle on my machine in cold water and plan to let it hang to air dry.
Love it. Flattering fit and looks very elegant. Fabric is cotton and very suitable for summer.  Will definitely buy additional colors.

I bought a similar dress a while back and it shrunk after washing. I did learn a tip to help your fabric stretch back to original size and that’s hand washing with conditioner to soften the fabric and then stretch gently and hang dry. Point of that tip is you can avoid the mess and labor just wash this type of garment by hand or just gentle wash with cold water in your machine then stretch gently and hang dry. But if you already shrunk your garment try to use conditioner (dollar tree or cheap conditioner will do the trick. Don’t waste your good hair care) The dress its self was well made and is flattering to this short, curvy, big booty mom bod. I’m 5’3” and about 180 lbs and I ordered a large. I get compliments all the time when I wear this dress.

Was concerned being short, but this dress hit right above ankle. Material is lightweight but not really see through. Or not the dark turquoise with pattern.  Love the flowy sleeves. May end up getting in another color

The fit is very comfortable, the fabric soft and the print is vibrant. Have worn it twice and have been complimented on it both times by strangers. I am curvy but I honestly think this dress would look lovely on any body type.

I really love this dress, it fits perfectly and is very flattering. I ordered this one because I own the pink and black one I adore! The fabric is super soft and great for travel. The photos in the description for the orange red color are nothing like the actual fabric. I was looking for a soft subtle color, not bright bold colors! I would love to try another, but I’m worried the colors will be way off.
Got this for a cruise- it’s really cute, comfortable and light weight. The colors beautiful and vibrant.
Love the fabric. Feels silky. Will be comfortable in the warm weather.
Fabric is wonderful, but cut too small. This is the biggest they make so I'll keep it, but it's not really comfortable. Super annoying when you think I'm tiny.

This dress is a nice flattering style, however the colors are a bit bolder than I thought from pictures and it was not true to size. I got XL but could probably make do with a medium, and may be in between that and a large

Loved it so much I bought in two colors! I normally wear a Large and purchased a Large in both. The tan/red paisley dress fit perfectly, but the blue paisley one is sized almost a whole size larger. It’s still wearable, but it’s a lot longer and wider in the bust area.  I love the flutter sleeves, it steams easily, and it’s long enough on my frame to balance well. The dresses are not see through, and while the garment is not lined, the fabric lays nicely and has enough heft that it does not get staticky or blow about; no need for a slip generally. These have held up well through roughly once a week wears since March. I wash on a cool/gentle cycle and hang dry. No fading so far and minimal shrinkage after the first wash.
The fabric is very good I like it
I bought this dress. In March for a may wedding so I missed the return window. I took the dress to be hemmed and the seamstress found 2 holes in the dress. Won’t buy another dress from amazon

Cute enough but not on me. I’m 5’8” 140lbs

This dress style is really cute and it runs true to size. However, the one I bought looks red and blue in the photo, but when it arrived the red color was actually orange and I didn’t like it at all. I returned it and ordered a different color.
